body_html:
The checkpoint should not be limited to 2GB for saving. You don't need to freeze the graph. You can create a saver in the graph, which you can use with session.Run. Something like this:

  const tensorflow::Status status = session->Run(
      {{"save/Const", "/path/to/checkpoint"}}, {} /* no output */,
      {"save/restore_all"}, nullptr /* no output */);
